home.title: Welcome to my portfolio
home.subtitle: I'm a Full-Stack developer and multidisciplinary professional.

about.title: About me
about.description: I am a Full-Stack developer with experience in programming, education, accounting, cybersecurity, and administration. I combine technical skills with leadership, languages, and strong professional background.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text: 14 years in education, 8 years as a teacher, 3 as coordinator, professional accountant and software developer.

education.title: Education
education.text: Cisco courses, cybersecurity studies, programming in multiple languages, and cloud computing experience.

languages.title: Languages
languages.text: Native Spanish, upper-intermediate English, advanced French, and Haitian Creole.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here is a selection of the projects I have worked on, using modern technologies and good development practices.

items.portfolio: This modern, responsive, animated professional portfolio.
items.mobileApp: Mobile application developed for my business, available for Android and macOS.
